intro.name: Hello, my name is
intro.text: I have a digital engineering degree from ESAIP Angers. I like automation and building web-related things. Recently, I was able to develop my cloud computing skills by obtaining two AWS certifications.

about.title: About me
about.text_1: Hello! My name is Alexis and I love creating web-related things. I started programming in high school with Python, HTML, or Java courses, but my interest in web development started in 2021 with an introductory Javascript course from a passionate teacher who stimulated my passion for web development.
about.text_2: I recently completed two AWS certifications. My journey to achieve these certifications allowed me to discover in me a curiosity for the cloud that I did not know about. I now hope to find opportunities to apply this newly acquired knowledge.
about.technologies: Here are some technologies I have worked with :

2.title: Fullstack developer intern
2.bullet_points: 6 month internship|Integration of analytics API|Creation of end-to-end tests|Creation of API endpoints|Continuous improvement of the application

3.title: Web developer intern
3.bullet_points: 2 month internship|Integrated real time updates with Websockets|Various performance optimizations and bug fixes|Implemented a client chat feature with it's overview dashboard|Vue, Laravel

4.title: Web developer
4.bullet_points: Service paid by the company to the school to fund parts of a student's curriculum|The company was opening it's new shop and needed a planning tool for the workshop to keep track of the work to be done and assigning it to different people|Vue, Laravel
